name: Shokai (polBru)
description:
Description and lore:

Shokai is a survival shooter in a dynamic arena featuring a shop with a handful of abilities and gadgets. 

You are a human war-prisoner from the battle against the aliens. You are now stuck fighting endless waves of enemies as a mech gladiator on the flying dynamic arena known as the Shokai.
